DOC.brief_summary: Patients will be randomized into two groups (1/1) during one year: - 40 mg adalimumab subcutaneously (sc) every other week - placebo The effect on x-rays and clinical parameters will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Adalimumab in Patients With Erosive Osteoarthritis of the Interphalangeal Finger Joints
DOC.criteria: Clear erosive image on xray of at least one interphalangeal finger joint
